item.title: Miscellaneous rubbish dumped in access road, 15th July
item.description:
This fly tipping started about 2 weeks ago and is gradually getting added to, now large pile on kerb of access road to Roberts Close. I understand the manager of Roberts Close has reported this also.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1-21, Roberts Close, New Eltham, London

item.title: Lane closure but work is on the pavement, 15th July
item.description:
Thames Water are fixing a problem with a meter on the pavement but have closed a lane of the road and installed stop/go lights. This would be fine if they were actually working but the lane closure has been left for a couple of days now with no work going on - this is unnecessary and just delays traffic.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rectory Lane, Albany Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken Glass on road, 15th July
item.description:
There are large amounts of broken glass all over the road, particularly at the spot reported as well as the end of the road near coming off onto Cassland Road.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Harrowgate Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Whole of thicket road past the park access gate, 15th July
item.description:
The stretch of thicket road from the park gate towards the penge gate is filthy. 3 dog poos, nos canisters, food waste, chicken bones etc. now that the gate has been closed and residents are forced to walk along this road to the penge gate entrance which only exacerbates the issue. Please can this be regularly cleaned as it is normally missed on the twice weekly cleans by Veolia
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Thicket Road, Crystal Palace, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Trees have grown too tall length is exceeding distance to our house also blocking sunlight from garden, 15th July
item.description:
Two trees have grown immensely tall in recent years and the length of them now exceeds the distance to our house. Only yesterday a tree at the end of our garden got blown over in the wind so we are concerned about this happening with the very tall trees. They also block sunlight from our garden

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Heatherbank, Chislehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned Vehicle Report – KV70 FDK, 15th July
item.description:
Dear Hackney Council, There is a white MG ZS (Reg: KV70 FDK) that appears abandoned near Winslade House, Upper Clapton, E5 9LA. The car has rear damage, flat tyres, hasn’t moved in a long time, and is parked by double yellow lines. Photos are attached.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Upper Clapton Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
